entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
